sourcesContent:
<template>
    <nav class="navbar">
        <button @click="goTo('/')" :disabled="$route.path === '/'">Home</button>
        <button @click="goTo('/login')" :disabled="$route.path === '/login'">Login</button>
        <button @click="goTo('/register')" :disabled="$route.path === '/register'">Register</button>

        <button @click="logout" v-if="isAuthenticated">Exit</button>

    </nav>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {

    computed: {
    // Проверяем, авторизован ли пользователь
    isAuthenticated() {
      return !!localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    },
  },

    methods: {
      goTo(route) {
        this.$router.push(route);
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .navbar {
    display: flex;
    gap: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  button {
    padding: 10px 15px;
    background-color: #3498db;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  button:hover {
    background-color: #2980b9;
  }
  </style>
